thread.title: How winter vortex is boosting sales of heaters and beanies

title: How winter vortex is boosting sales of heaters and beanies
text:
How winter vortex is boosting sales o... How winter vortex is boosting sales of heaters and beanies Next Story Prev Story 3 hrs ago Read more: The Age 
A cold snap that brought icy conditions and general misery to much of Australia's east coast has left one group of people very happy: retailers. The first bitter winter spell arrived on the weekend courtesy of a cold front that sent temperatures plunging and people scrambling for beanies, ski gloves and heaters.   The Age.
